ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Greetings All :)
ygData.msgSnippet: ** sigh ** I guess I m the loner. I m on Drinal & Luclin. My main is a 41 druid named Charai accompanied by a warrior named Athynna, bard named Jovvi, monk
ygData.messageBody:
** sigh **

I guess I'm the loner. I'm on Drinal & Luclin.

My main is a 41 druid named Charai accompanied by a warrior named Athynna, bard named Jovvi, monk named Whyyte Lhyyte(hehehe), pally named Minniey & a chanter named Tymthyn Jhntr (sound it out - think Monte Python).

Anyone got suggestions for zones for the druid. Currently camping ruins in Dreadlands, but it is getting slow going xp wise (though cash loot is rather profitable)

Also, need some ideas for wisdom gear. Charai was 1st character & I made some serious errors setting her up. So looking for some nice mana & wisdom gear. Especially since I am starting on my epic soon ;)

Laters

Charai


Sue

Just me
No cute, sappy quotes
No wise words of wisdom

---------------------------------
